content: She later became a student in the Xavier Institute's Special Class. Quentin Quire invented a special hovering case to hold her brain, usually linked to a chain held by Ernst, a mysterious, super-strong mutant appearing like an old woman, who often repeated Martha's telepathic communications.
education: Currently enrolled in high school classes
powers: Telepathy; able to mentally broadcast "psycho-chaff" to cloud the minds of others
